tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicalDeviceData (
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    age INTEGER,
    gender TEXT,
    location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vital_signs (
    record_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    heart_rate INTEGER,
    blood_pressure TEXT,
    body_temperature REAL,
    FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name STRING,
  age INT,
  gender STRING,
  blood_type STRING
);

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  device_id UUID,
  data_time TIMESTAMP,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR,
  temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  blood_type VARCHAR(5),
  last_checkup DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalDevices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50),
  device_type VARCHAR(20),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE VitalSigns (
  sign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  temperature FLOAT,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(15),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  message TEXT,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR,
  temperature DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE device_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_oxygen_level DECIMAL,
  battery_percent INT
)

CREATE TABLE alert_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_type VARCHAR,
  patient_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR,
  phone_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE notification_history (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_id UUID,
  healthcare_provider_id UUID,
  status VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
